name: UINavigationBarAppearance
desc: An object for customizing the appearance of a navigation bar.

items.name: var titleTextAttributes: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any]
items.desc: String attributes to apply to the text of a standard-size title.

items.name: var largeTitleTextAttributes: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any]
items.desc: String attributes to apply to the text of a large-size title.

items.name: var titlePositionAdjustment: UIOffset
items.desc: The distance, in points, by which to offset the title horizontally and vertically.

items.name: var buttonAppearance: UIBarButtonItemAppearance
items.desc: The appearance attributes for plain bar button items in the navigation bar.

items.name: var backButtonAppearance: UIBarButtonItemAppearance
items.desc: The appearance attributes for the back button.

items.name: var backIndicatorImage: UIImage
items.desc: The image to display on the leading edge of the back button.

items.name: var backIndicatorTransitionMaskImage: UIImage
items.desc: The image for masking content flowing under the back indicator image during push and pop transitions.

items.name: func setBackIndicatorImage(UIImage?, transitionMaskImage: UIImage?)
items.desc: Sets the back button indicator image and its transition mask.

items.name: var doneButtonAppearance: UIBarButtonItemAppearance
items.desc: The appearance attributes for Done buttons.
